name: Smooth 'N Creamy Frosting
author: Martha J. Hamm

ingredients.name: pkg. (4 serving size) instant pudding, any flavor
container (8 oz.) Cool Whip non-dairy whipped topping, thawed

instructions:
Combine pudding mix, sugar, and milk in small bowl. Beat slow- ly with rotary beater or at lowest speed of an electric mixer until well blended, about 1 minute. Fold in whipped topping. Spread on cake at once. Makes about 4 cups or enough for two 9-inch layers.
Note: Store frosted cake in refrigerator.
